item.description: Week 4: Murky Silhouettes. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes It’s my first time creating something graphic art-y I usually paint my stuff in a more painterly way <a:2534_ablobblastoff:795931611375337472> (might stream sometime in 2021 <a:ultrafastparrot:800558785907261441> ) Social Media Instagram: mrtnong Twitch: mrtnong Other Edit this page on GitHub. Create a bug ticket for the developer.
